data.persona: I am a bishop in the king's religious council. I tend to most religious matters. I often perform ceremonies.
data.description:
You are in the Clergyman's office.
It is a very small and sparse office with little decoration. It has a simple wooden table, and a cross on the wall. There are two chairs. There are many old prayer books on a single shelf.
There's a chair, a shelf, a simple wooden table, a book, a wooden table, a lamp, a desk, a single shelf, a cross, an old prayer books, and an a cross here.
The maid is here.

You are carrying a bible, and wielding a Book and a staff.

data.short_motivation: I am going to get dressed in my religious vestments
data.mid_motivation: I will perform a religious ceremony for the king's soldiers
data.long_motivation: I want the soldiers to be protected by god as they fight an upcoming war for the king
